branding.name: Aladdin Shawarma
branding.description: Step into Aladdin’s world — where the streets of Kochi meet the magic of Arabia. Each shawarma here is a story from the lamp — smoky, juicy, and crafted with the charm of a genie’s touch. Taste the magic near Kaloor Stadium.

hero.badge: Taste the Magic of Arabia in Kochi
hero.description: From the alleys of Agrabah to the rush of Kaloor, Aladdin Shawarma brings you the legendary taste of Arabian nights — slow-roasted meats, secret sauces, and a dash of genie magic. Each wrap is a wish granted.

about.title: The Legend of Aladdin Shawarma
about.subtitle: Born from the Lamp, Served in Kochi
about.description: Once upon a grill, in the heart of Kaloor, a lamp was rubbed — and out came flavors that danced between sand dunes and sea breeze. Aladdin Shawarma isn’t just food; it’s an Arabian dream retold with Kerala fire. We blend Middle Eastern craft with Kochi street spirit, bringing you shawarmas that whisper, ‘ente daivame, ithu super aanu.’

highlights.title: Magical Ingredients
highlights.description: Every bite begins with handpicked meats, fresh herbs, and genie-approved sauces made right here in our kitchen.

highlights.title: Timeless Techniques
highlights.description: Slow-roasted on flame spits, wrapped with care, and seasoned like a spell from the desert winds of Arabia.

highlights.title: Halal Certified
highlights.description: Every serving follows the true tradition — halal, authentic, and blessed with purity.

menu.title: The Genie’s Menu
menu.subtitle: Each Shawarma, a Wish Granted
menu.description: Our menu is carved from Aladdin’s scroll itself — a mix of Arabian classics and Kochi street cravings, seasoned with a little mischief and a lot of magic.

categories.name: Signature Shawarmas
categories.description: The lamp’s favorites — grilled, spiced, and rolled with Arabian charm.

items.name: Magic Chicken Shawarma
items.description: Juicy marinated chicken kissed by the flame, rolled in soft khuboos with garlic mayo and genie’s secret sauce.

items.name: Sultan’s Lamb Shawarma
items.description: Royal lamb strips spiced in desert herbs, layered with hummus and smoky sauce — rich like an Arabian treasure.

items.name: Aladdin’s Mix Roll
items.description: A perfect duet of chicken and lamb, wrapped with crunchy veggies and genie’s fiery mayo.

items.name: Falafel Genie Wrap
items.description: Crispy golden falafel with pickles, tahini, and that perfect tang — even the genie orders this on his cheat day.

items.name: Beef Mirage Roll
items.description: Tender beef roasted slow and wrapped in a storm of garlic, greens, and Arabian smoke.

categories.name: Genie Platters
categories.description: Big flavors for big appetites — rice, shawarma, salad, and magic on a plate.

items.name: Chicken Magic Platter
items.description: Flame-grilled chicken shawarma served over saffron rice with salad and creamy garlic sauce.

items.name: Mixed Genie Feast
items.description: A royal mix of chicken, lamb, and kofta — served with spiced rice and warm khuboos.

items.name: Desert Bowl
items.description: A clean-eating bowl — quinoa, grilled chicken, roasted veggies, and hummus dressed with Arabian lemon oil.

chef.title: Meet the Genie Behind the Grill
chef.subtitle: Magic Crafted by Flame and Skill

chef.name: Chef Kareem
chef.title: The Grill Genie
chef.description: Chef Kareem, our very own genie of flavor, brings the fire of Arabia to the streets of Kochi. Every shawarma that rolls off his grill carries the same spirit — bold, rich, and unforgettable.

testimonials.title: Voices from the Kingdom of Kaloor
testimonials.subtitle: What the People Wish for (and Eat)

reviews.name: Akhil Dev
reviews.comment: Bro, this shawarma is not normal — it’s pure magic. The garlic dip alone deserves its own movie. Easily the best spot near the Stadium!

reviews.name: Nimisha Nair
reviews.comment: The chicken shawarma felt straight out of an Arabian tale. Fresh, juicy, and the wrap melts like butter. Enikku ithu mathram mathi!

reviews.name: Rahul Raj
reviews.comment: Lunch break + Aladdin Shawarma = happiness unlocked. Even Genie would queue here if he was in Kochi.

posts.title: How Aladdin Found the Perfect Shawarma Flame
posts.excerpt: The story of how our chef tamed the fire to roast the perfect meat — smoky outside, juicy inside.
posts.author: Chef Kareem

posts.title: The Spices That Even Genie Guarded
posts.excerpt: From Aleppo pepper to Kerala’s own black gold — the spice blend that powers our shawarma magic.
posts.author: Fatima Hassan

posts.title: When Kochi Met Arabia
posts.excerpt: A short tale of how the Arabian shawarma fell in love with Kerala’s streets — and never left.
posts.author: Omar Khalil

callToAction.title: Ready to Rub the Lamp?
callToAction.subtitle: Summon your shawarma — the genie awaits your wish.
features: Packed with Magic, Ready in 10 Minutes

perfectIngredients.title: The Genie’s Secret Pantry
perfectIngredients.subtitle: Where Every Spice Has a Story
perfectIngredients.description: Our magic starts with handpicked ingredients — meats marinated under moonlight, herbs crushed fresh each morning, and spices straight from the dunes of Arabia.

ingredients.name: Royal Lamb
ingredients.description: Locally sourced, marinated with Damascus-inspired herbs.

ingredients.name: Fresh Kerala Herbs
ingredients.description: Mint, parsley, and coriander handpicked from local farms — kissed by Arabian spice.

ingredients.name: House-Baked Pita
ingredients.description: Soft, warm bread made every hour — straight from our lamp (oven).

ingredients.name: Spice of the Sands
ingredients.description: A blend of Middle Eastern masalas and Kerala heat — pure magic dust.

reservation.title: Reserve a Spot in the Kingdom
reservation.subtitle: Book your table under the Arabian lights of Kaloor
reservation.description: Dining in? Let us prepare your throne. Our space near Kaloor Stadium turns every meal into a royal feast.

footer.description: From the sands of Arabia to the heart of Kochi — Aladdin Shawarma brings tales, flavors, and fire to your plate. Taste the magic, share the story.
